name: trogdor
summary: A coding theme to help minimize eye strain.
description:
This is an upload of my C/C++ theme for gVim that I designed to minimize long hour coding eye strain, and I think it works better than most.  A picture of it can be found here 
http://renderguild.com/vim/colors/trogdor.png
install_details:
1. Copy trogdor.vim into your /gvim/colors/ folder
2. Inside of gvim execute ":color trogdor"
